thread.title: Three injured in Rayton accident
thread.title_full: Three injured in Rayton accident | News24

author: news24.com
title: Three injured in Rayton accident
text:
Johannesburg - Three people were injured, one critically so, after a vehicle rolled on a gravel road about two kilometres from Rayton on Saturday.
Netcare 911 spokesperson Chris Botha said paramedics arrived at the scene and found one man in a critical condition while two others sustained serious injuries.
“After the critically injured man was treated at the scene, they airlifted him with the Netcare 2 medical helicopter to a specialised facility. The two other patients were treated at the scene and then transported by ambulance to a nearby,” he said.
